akasagalalli adesto ‘malak’galiddare. Avara sipharas'sininda yava labhavu aguvudilla – tanicchisuvavana paravagi allahanu anumati niduva hagu avanu ista paduva munna
paralokadalli nambike illadavaru malak‌galige henmakkala hesarugalanniduttare
avarige a kuritu yava jnanavu illa. Avaru kevala uheyannaste anusarisuttiddare. Mattu uheyu satyakke kincittu paryayavalla
nam'ma upadesadinda mukha tirugisi kondiruvavanannu kadeganisiri – avanu bayasuvudu kevala ihalokada badukannu matra
aduve avara jnanada mitiyagide. Khanditavagiyu nim'ma odeyanu – tanna margadinda dura saridiruvavanu yarembudannu cennagi ballanu mattu saridariyalliruvavanu yarembudannu avanu cennagi ballanu

akasagalalli hagu bhumiyalliruva ellavu allahanige serive. Ketta karmagalannu madidavarige avanu avara karmakkanusaravada pratiphalavannu niduvanu mattu satkarmagalannu madidavarige satphalavannu niduvanu

Avaru (satkarmigalu), sanna putta pramadagala horatu, ella dodda papakrtyagalinda hagu aslila karyagalinda dura uliyuttare. Khanditavagiyu nim'modeyanu visala ksama guna ullavanagiddane. Avanantu, tanu nim'mannu bhumiyinda huttisidagalu, nivu nim'ma tayandira hottegalolage putta makkalagiddagalu nim'mannu cennagi ballanu. Nivu nim'ma pavitrada kuritu koccikollabedi. Dharmanisthanu yarembudannu avanu cennagi ballanu
nivu nodidira, mukha tirugisi kondavanannu
avanu svalpavannu matra (danavagi) kottanu mattu (ulidudannu) tadedittukondanu
avana bali kanada lokada jnanavideye mattu avanu adannu (kanada lokavannu) kanuttiddaneye
avanige tilisalagillave, musara hottagegalalliruva visayavannu
mattu (divyadesagalannu) palisida ibrahimara (samacaravannu)
(paralokadalli) hore horuva yavanu innobbana horeyannu horalaranu
mattu manavanige, avanu sramisidastallade berenu sigadu
mattu avana sramavu (pratiphalada rupadalli) begane kanalu siguvudu
a balika avanige purna pratiphala nidalaguvudu
mattu (ellavu teraluva) antima neleyu nim'ma odeyana kadege ide
khanditavagiyu avane (allahane) nagisuttane mattu alisuttane
mattu avane sayisuttane mattu badukisuttane
avane, gandu mattu hennemba jotegalannu srstisidavanu –
– surisalada viryadinda
punah jivantagolisuva honeyu avana meleye ide
avane, svayattagolisidavanu hagu sampannagolisidavanu
avane ‘si'ara’da (tareya) odeyanu
avane, prathama ‘ad’rannu nasa madidavanu
mattu samudarannu aste. Avanu (avaralli) yarannu ulisalilla
i hinde nuhara janangavannu (avanu nasamadiddanu). Khanditavagiyu avaru tumba akramigalagiddaru hagu vidrohigalagiddaru
Mattu avanu maguci bidda (lut‌ra janangada) nadannu nuccu nuru madidanu
avarisuva vastuvondu adannu (a nadannu) avarisikondittu
(manava,) nininnu ninnodeyana yavella kodugegala kuritu sansayisuve
avaru (dutaru) i hinde eccarisalu bandavara salina, obba eccarisuvavaragiddare
hattira barabekadudu (lokantyada ghalige) hattira bandu bittide
allahana horatu beraru adannu nivarisalararu
nivenu i matina kuritu accari paduttiddira
mattu nivu naguttiri, aluvudilla
nivu bhari doddastike mereyuttiri
innadaru, nivu allahanige sastanga vandisiri mattu avananne aradhisiri
(lokantyada) a ksanavu samipisitu mattu candravu silihoyitu
avaru yavudadaru puraveyannu kandaga mukha tirugisikolluttare mattu idu tira tatkalika jadugarike ennuttare
avaru (satyavannu) tiraskarisidaru mattu sveccheyannu anusarisidaru. Nijavagi, ella visayagaligu ondu kala niscitavagiruttade
khandita, pathadayaka mahitigalu avara balige bandive
paripurna janmeya (upadesavu talupide). Adare eccarisuvavarinda avarigenu labhavagilla
(dutare,) nivu avarannu kadeganisibidiri. (Sighradalle) kareyuvavanobbanu tira apriyavadudara kadege (avarannu) kareyuvanu
aga avara drstigalu taggiruvavu. Avaru cadurida midategalo embante gorigalinda eddu baruvaru
